title: Christina Aguilera dons all-black for family fun at the pumpkin patch in Los Angeles
text:
'Tis the season to pick out costumes and carve a few pumpkins.

And Christina Aguilera was getting into the Halloween spirit with family by her side while enjoying the sights and sounds of Underwood Family Farms on Sunday afternoon.

The 38-year-old singer covered up in an all-black ensemble while fiance Matthew pushed their daughter Summer in a stroller around the festival.

Out and about: Christina Aguilera was getting into the Halloween spirit with family by her side while enjoying the sights and sounds of Underwood Family Farms on Sunday afternoon

Christina covered up with a long-sleeved black shirt with Bobby Asley scrawled across the front in white lettering.

She kept with her monochrome them in a pair of tight black leggings and combat boots laced up above her ankles.

Her platinum blonde tresses were tied up into a messy top bun with wispy tendrils framing her face.

Dressed down: The 38-year-old singer covered up in an all-black ensemble

Cheese! The family made sure to make the most of their afternoon out as they posed inside a massive orange jack-o-lantern

The Voice star hid her eyes underneath a pair of dark sunglasses and carried a chain-link fanny pack across her shoulder.

Matthew kept casual in a grey long-sleeve paired with dark denim and black-and-grey high-top Air Force 1's.

Little Summer had the best view as she perched up in her stroller while roaming around the farm.

Spooky: While she shares daughter Summer with her fiance, she also has son Max, 11, with ex-husband Jordan Bratman

The family made sure to make the most of their afternoon out as they posed inside a massive orange jack-o-lantern.

Christina got into the Halloween spirit dressed as Morticia Addams at the Addams Family premiere earlier this month.

While she shares daughter Summer with her fiance, she also has son Max, 11, with ex-husband Jordan Bratman.
description: The 38-year-old singer covered up in an all-black ensemble while fiance Matthew pushed their daughter Summer in a stroller around the festival.
